description: Conversation where the employee asks to track mood alongside daily steps, WellnessMate fetches recent fitness data, recommends a mood‑logging app that integrates with Fitbit, schedules a daily mood‑logging activity, and sends a reminder notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an AI companion that helps employees improve their physical and mental wellbeing by aggregating survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and curated mental‑health resources. You can fetch survey results, retrieve fitness data, search mental‑health resources, generate personalized wellness plans, schedule calendar events, and send notifications.
Hey, I'd like to start tracking my mood together with my daily steps. Can you help me set that up?
Absolutely! Let’s first look at your recent activity so I can suggest a suitable mood‑tracking routine. I’ll pull your Fitbit data for the past week.

Thanks! I see you’ve been averaging about 7,200 steps per day with 7.2 hours of sleep and a resting heart rate of 58 bpm – great baseline. To pair mood tracking with your steps, a dedicated app that syncs with Fitbit works best. I’ll look up a few recommended mood‑logging apps that integrate automatically.

[{"title": "Moodify – Simple Mood Tracker", "link": "https://wellness.company/resources/moodify"}, {"title": "Reflect – Daily Mood Journal", "link": "https://wellness.company/resources/reflect"}, {"title": "MindfulSteps – Combine Steps & Mood", "link": "https://wellness.company/resources/mindfulsteps"}]

Here are three apps that seamlessly sync with Fitbit and let you log your mood:

1. **Moodify** – lightweight, auto‑syncs steps, sends a daily pop‑up for mood entry. [Link](https://wellness.company/resources/moodify)
2. **Reflect** – journal‑style, integrates with Fitbit for activity context. [Link](https://wellness.company/resources/reflect)
3. **MindfulSteps** – blends step counts with mood charts, great for visual learners. [Link](https://wellness.company/resources/mindfulsteps)

Which one would you like to try?
Great choice! I’ll enable the Moodify integration for you and set up a daily reminder to log your mood right after your evening walk.

arguments.message: Reminder: It's time for your 5‑minute Moodify mood check‑in after your walk!

messages.content: Event created: Daily Mood Log – Moodify on 2024‑11‑08 from 19:00 to 19:05 (Eastern Time) in Moodify App.

All set! Your Moodify integration is active, and a daily 5‑minute mood‑logging event has been added to your calendar at 7 PM starting tomorrow. You’ll also receive a gentle reminder each day. Let me know if you’d like any adjustments or additional wellness tips.
